//turn on
TURN_ON = {3450,1700, 450,450, 400,450, 400,1300, 400,1300, 400,450, 450,1250, 450,450, 400,450, 400,450, 450,1200, 450,450, 400,450, 400,1300, 500,350, 450,1250, 500,400, 450,1150, 600,350, 500,350, 500,1100, 600,400, 450,400, 450,400, 450,400, 450,1250, 500,350, 500,1200, 500,350, 500,1200, 500,1200, 500,400, 500,350, 500,350, 500,350, 500,1200, 500,1250, 450,1250, 450,1250, 450,400, 450,400, 500};
